title: Lindy Klim and husband Adam Ellis speaks about their co-parenting relationship with her ex Michael
text:
Lindy Klim married British property developer Adam Ellis last year after her ten-year marriage with Olympian Michael Klim fell a part in 2016.

Now the couple have spoken about their positive relationship with the champion swimmer.

The Balinese Princess, 42, told this week's issue of Stellar: 'The relationship Michael and I have is incredible.'

'We have been able to come through such a difficult time': Lindy Klim and her second husband Adam Ellis spoke fondly about their co-parenting relationship with her Olympian ex Michael Klim. Pictured: Lindy Klim, Adam Ellis and children Stella, Rocco, Frankie and Goldie

She explained they have an open dialogue about raising their children - daughters Stella, 13, and Frankie, eight, and 11-year-old son Rocco - which took them four years to develop and achieve.

'We have been able to come through such a difficult time, and that's not to say I am going to sugarcoat it.

'We are always going to have difficult moments that come up, but at least we can speak about it as adults and we can just not have the anger behind it anymore,' she told the publication.

Her husband Adam also spoke fondly about his relationship with the Milk Skincare entrepreneur, saying they often hang out and go to the gym together.

Blended family: 'We are always going to have difficult moments that come up, but at least we can speak about it as adults and we can just not have the anger behind it anymore,' Lindy said. Pictured: Adam, Lindy, Michael with Rocco, Frankie and Stella

Mother-daughter time! Lindy and daughter Goldie posed for a cute snap together in Stellar

'Compared to how it could have gone so wrong, it's incredible... it's bizarre even to us,' he said.

Aside from her great friendship with Michael, Lindy recently revealed she will launch her own beauty line after signing over her rights to skincare range Milk which she co-founded with Michael in 2008.

In an interview with The Sun Herald, she said: 'I'm currently working on a revolutionary, first to market product aimed specifically for women, that I can't wait to share very soon.'

'It will be revolutionary': Lindy recently revealed she will launch her own beauty line after signing over her rights to skincare range Milk which she co-founded with Michael in 2008. Pictured: Lindy and her daughters Stella, Frankie and Goldie

Following their divorce in 2016, Lindy signed over the rights to Michael and entered a three-year non-compete clause.

While their split was at first difficult, the former couple have made amends for the sake of their three children.

In June this year, Lindy celebrated Frankie's eighth birthday with Michael and her second husband Adam Ellis at the Finns VIP Beach Club in Bali, Indonesia.
